member.name: T:OpenTelemetry.Trace.TracerProviderBuilderExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to add instrumentation support for many common instrumentation packages.

member.name: M:OpenTelemetry.Trace.TracerProviderBuilderExtensions.AddAutoInstrumentations(OpenTelemetry.Trace.TracerProviderBuilder)
member.summary: Adds support for common instrumentation packages. Refer to documentation for a complete list of included instrumentations.
member.returns: The instance of to chain the calls.
